S5.T2.caption: Table 2. The performance of all methods on the three real-world datasets. The best results are highlighted in bold, and the second-best results are underlined.

references: Table 2 shows the experimental results of all methods on three real-world datasets. To more intuitively demonstrate the superiority of MCDCF, we calculated the improvement of each metric in MCDCF compared to the second-best one, using ’Imp.’ to denote this degree of enhancement. Through comparison, the impact of MCDCF’s improvement across various indicators is evident.

Table 3 shows the experimental results of MCDCF and its variants on the three real-world datasets. Moreover, MCDCF outperforms both variants, demonstrating the effectiveness and superiority of its strategy for recovering latent confounders on both the user and item sides. The consistent results across three real-world datasets illustrate the robustness of the MCDCF method.
